Key Match Events: The match was abandoned due to rain after 10 stop-start overs.
Scotland reached 90-0 off 10 overs before the game was halted.
Post-Match Reflections: England's head coach Matthew Mott criticized the team's performance but remained optimistic.
Scotland's Richie Berrington said his team gave themselves a chance.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was held at Kensington Oval, Barbados, with a small but lively crowd present.
The match was the first abandonment of the T20 World Cup 2024.
